title: montreal1
author: montreal1
content: I just want to say hello. In a hundred+ years they will look back on what "Satoshi" did in absolute awe. We're here now ladies and gentlemen!!!! Just appreciate it!!! We are living through one of the most important times in human history. Bitcoin is a real store of interplanetary value.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: montreal1 on December 10, 2022, 05:12:07 AMI just want to say hello. In a hundred+ years they will look back on what "Satoshi" did in absolute awe. We're here now ladies and gentlemen!!!! Just appreciate it!!! We are living through one of the most important times in human history. Bitcoin is a real store of interplanetary value. A 100 years is so far to think people will look back because people are already looking back to 10 years ago and wishing they gave a shot at Bitcoin when it wasn't upto this.Even now more people also want to and still wish to join the moving train of a faster growing and evolutionary digital currency Bitcoin but are been held back because of lack of purchasing power(money).I know of a friend who strongly wish he can sell his land just to buy Bitcoin and I'm certain if he sees a buyer now, 80% of his money is heading straight bto Bitcoin fir long term.

comments.author: Cruxleo
comments.body: Quote from: montreal1 on December 10, 2022, 05:12:07 AMBitcoin is a real store of interplanetary value. In as much as Bitcoin is a store of value, it ain't limited to that!Statements and assumptions as quoted are seen by many as the only and real shores of Bitcoin. But no, C'mon OP Bitcoin has all other attributes of the traditional fiat (aside from being centralized) to elevate in years to come.

comments.author: Queentoshi
comments.body: Quote from: montreal1 on December 10, 2022, 05:12:07 AM We're here now ladies and gentlemen!!!! Just appreciate it!!! We are living through one of the most important times in human history. I am very happy that I am a part of those witnessing the growth, development and spread of bitcoins from a community like this in the front row of bitcoin discussions. In the nearest future when bitcoin has become relevant, it will feel good telling the stories about this time where bitcoins is still just gaining importance and acceptance. The people who stay hold on their bitcoins till after this period will be proud and happy that they did. I want to be among the set of people who never stop believing in bitcoins, so I am trying to buy and keep bitcoins as much as I can.

Yeah, that is possible.Perhaps when all bitcoin is mined, we will see the true value of Bitcoin in terms of price.Unfortunately,  appreciation on this technology is more regarding asset 'aspects' of cryptocurrency. comments.author: Wapfika
comments.body: Well the current price condition is worthy enough to categorized as interplanetary value that you are spouting since Bitcoin started from scratch up to the current price. There’s no company or investment platform that record this kind of astronomical growth.This post of yours should be posted 10 years ago and not for the 100 years in the future because the current price is already discovered. You are assuming as if Bitcoin is still not yet adapted by many 1st world country in the world.

comments.body: Quote from: Yatsan on December 10, 2022, 01:45:44 PMUnfortunately,  appreciation on this technology is more regarding asset 'aspects' of cryptocurrency. People are just making use of the market price volatility, and not its nature as a digital currency.Without these people, I doubt Bitcoin will propagate.  People are interested in profit.  They have all ears when it comes to money.  Do you think people will listen if you explain Bitcoin in technical terms?  I bet they will be bored and probably become sleepy.  But the moment we talk about profit and possible huge profit, people are all ears. But I hope people would still appreciate the beauty of blockchain.I agree, once Bitcoin gathers enough audience and community, the true function of Bitcoin will shine.  Like right now, some country is starting to accept Bitcoin as a mode of payment, many merchants are now accepting Bitcoin and even local stores, because of LN development is able to accept Bitcoin as option of payment without having to wait for long time just to confirm the transaction.

comments.author: Iroh
comments.body: I think there are lots of people who are at this moment in awe of bitcoin and what it entails. I know I am. But I would also say you’re reaching way too far when you say bitcoin is a store of interplanetary value. Perhaps you’ve got some proof of life on somewhere other than the planet Earth? In a hundred years from today and when the last bitcoin is mined, that is when we would truly know the worth and value of bitcoin. Then again, who knows what would happen in that time. The future is very unpredictable

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: In hundred years, they may still feel they are in the early stage and will feel awe still. A wallet with 500K satoshis today will probably be considered a whale by then. We're too hopeful for it to happen though. Remember that there is a fight going on right now where governments are fighting against crypto and each of them is releasing CBDC. The fight ain't over til it's over. And history will tell who wins this fight.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.created_time: December 10, 2022, 07:07:19 PMLast edit: December 10, 2022, 09:30:29 PM by Accardo
comments.body: Very soon the world will realize that the technology is deeper and more relevant than they perceived. People think it's just about the currency but the block chain technology can be used to eliminate rigging of election, improve job opportunity, bring life to Web3 and create a better surface for saving information. Other possibilities and features attached to the technology will change the world, not just it's currency.
